name: df-igen
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cigen, cmpo(s0, s1, crngo, cpw(crn(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))), cint(crab(s2, cfv(cidl, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ IdlGen =(s0 ∈ RingOps, s1 ∈ P(ran((1st ` s0)))↦ ⋂ { s2 ∈(Idl ` s0)| s1 ⊆ s2 })
comment: Define the ideal generated by a subset of a ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
